text: Python Check if one of the following items is in a list
I'm trying to find a short way to see if any of the following items is in a list, but my first attempt does not work.
Besides writing a function to accomplish this, is the any short way to check if one of multiple items is in a list.

code:
>>> a = [2,3,4]
>>> print (1 or 2) in a
False
>>> print (2 or 1) in a
True
